x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
In many organizations, employees often commute from similar locations to the office. However, lack of coordination and communication leads to following problems: Increased fuel costs and traffic congestion. No available carpooling opportunities. Environmental impact due to excessive carbon emissions. Difficulty in finding trusted carpool partners within the organization.
There is a need for a centralized, secure, and user-friendly carpooling solution that facilitates smarter, sustainable, and collaborative commuting.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: CarPool Central - One Ride Many Benefits
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Create a scoped application which combines the related components to easily install the application for use:

  • Tables: Create tables for Carpooling services and Carpooling requests.
  • Flow Designer: Workflows for notifications and request approvals.
  • Notifications: Configure email notifications for Carpooling requests.
  • Service Portal: Build an intuitive portal which provides a user friendly interface to search, offer service, request rides and track rides.
  • Catalog Items: Catalog Items/Record producers for users to submit carpooling service and carpooling request.
  • Security: Ensure only users with the nearest location can see and request rides.
  • Platform Analytics: Track application usage, environmental impact, and adoption metrics.
  • Mobile App Studio: Make the carpooling feature accessible on Now mobile app.
  • Integration: Integrate with external maps APIs like Google Maps for location based matching and tracking.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration: Google Maps or other third-pary Map API for location and tracking.
Users Pesonal Data: Access to employee personal data like location, work timings, and contact details.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Integration Complexity: External APIs (maps) may require additional licensing and setup.
Privacy/Security Concerns: Employees may be hesitant to share location or personal details.
Data Accuracy: Inaccurate user profiles can affect matching quality.
Service Portal/Mobile App: Building Responsive design for service portal and now mobile app.
